title: Person of Interest - season 5 (5x13 Finale) Ending
author: Venkata Sai Vamsi
comment: This is by far the most emotionally gripping episode in the whole fucking series. I am so glad to of came this far, and to of felt a part of the Machine Team every step of the way.

The ending was brilliant.  You felt each character as the series winded down.  John's sacrifice was beautiful.  Harold reuniting with his lost love and the last scene...brilliant.  Critics can bite me.
I just realised Shaw is wearing Root's jacket.

If you can hear this, you're alone.
The only thing left of me is the sound of my voice.
 I don't know if any of us made it.
Did we win? Did we lose? I don't know.
its cool to see this then looking back to the end of the pilot where John looked into the camera smiling and walked down the steeet
description: Person of Interest last scene, where the machine (in the voice of root) talks about it's learning over the past
